snippet: A Brazilian footballer who survived the air crash that killed most of his team in Colombia last month changed seats at the last minute after a team mate encouraged him to sit beside him, he said on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: A Brazilian footballer who survived the air crash that killed most of his team in Colombia last month changed seats at the last minute after a team mate encouraged him to sit beside him, he said on Saturday.

headline.main: Seat Swap May Have Saved Chapecoense Player's Life in Plane Crash
headline.print_headline: Seat Swap May Have Saved Chapecoense Player's Life in Plane Crash
